name: CbcMessage
brief:
Message IDs and handler for Cbc output
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcMessage: Defines message IDs (CBC_Message enum) for Cbc logging.
Uses COIN message handling framework (CoinMessageHandler).

Key message categories:
- CBC_SOLUTION: Integer solution found
- CBC_STATUS/CBC_STATUS2/CBC_STATUS3: Progress reports
- CBC_GAP: Optimality gap information
- CBC_ROOT: Root node summary
- CBC_GENERATOR: Cut generator statistics
- CBC_BRANCH: Branching decisions
- CBC_THREAD_STATS: Parallel statistics

Text in CbcMessage.cpp supports multiple languages (default: us_en).
